name: Amoxicillin
description: An antibiotic used to treat a number of bacterial infections.

name: Ibuprofen
description: A medication used to relieve pain, swelling, and inflammation.

name: Paracetamol
description: A commonly used medicine that can help treat pain and reduce a high temperature (fever).

name: Aspirin
description: A salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate) that is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation.

name: Citalopram
description: An antidepressant belonging to a group of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs).

name: Amlodipine
description: A medicine used to treat high blood pressure and prevent chest pain caused by angina.

name: Simvastatin
description: A statin, a type of drug that lowers cholesterol in the body by blocking the enzyme in the liver that makes cholesterol.

name: Omeprazole
description: A proton pump inhibitor that decreases the amount of acid produced in the stomach.

name: Lansoprazole
description: Used to treat certain stomach and esophagus problems (such as acid reflux, ulcers).

name: Losartan
description: Used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and to help protect the kidneys from damage due to diabetes.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: A diuretic medication often used to treat high blood pressure and swelling due to fluid build up.

name: Metformin
description: A first-line medication for the treatment of type 2 diabetes.

name: Atorvastatin
description: A medication used to prevent cardiovascular disease and treat abnormal lipid levels.

name: Albuterol
description: A medication that opens up the airways in the lungs.

name: Gabapentin
description: A medication used to treat epilepsy, neuropathic pain, hot flashes, and restless legs syndrome.

name: Sertraline
description: A selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) used to treat depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder, panic disorder and anxiety.

name: Furosemide
description: A medication used to treat fluid build-up due to heart failure, liver scarring, or kidney disease.

name: Zolpidem
description: A medication primarily used for the short-term treatment of sleeping problems.

name: Lisinopril
description: A medication of the angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor class used to treat high blood pressure, heart failure, and after heart attacks.

name: Meloxicam
description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to treat pain or inflammation caused by arthritis.
